title: Sampler, 17th–19th century
medium:
Medium: silk and linen embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in rococo, satin, cross, tied cross, tent, roumanian, running, stem, interlaced herringbone stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Isolated motifs in a 17th century manner.  Sampler has had much repair.  There are areas where silk has been removed from foundation.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 17th–19th century.
17th–19th century. Medium: silk and linen embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in rococo, satin, cross, tied cross, tent, roumanian, running, stem, interlaced herringbone stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-62.
